General.Name: Japan Gold Corp
General.Description: Japan Gold Corp., a mineral exploration company, engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in Japan. The company primarily explores for gold deposits. It holds a portfolio of 34 gold projects located on Hokkaido, Honshu, and Kyushu islands of Japan. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 669 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 0B4
